destinations.name: Kyoto
destinations.description: A city blending ancient temples with stunning cherry blossoms and modern culture.

destinations.name: New York
destinations.description: A bustling metropolis known for Times Square, Broadway, and iconic skyscrapers.

destinations.name: Santorini
destinations.description: Famous for its white-washed buildings, blue domes, and breathtaking sunsets.

destinations.name: Machu Picchu
destinations.description: An ancient Incan city nestled in the Andes, offering stunning mountain views.

destinations.name: Venice
destinations.description: A unique floating city with canals, gondolas, and historic architecture.

destinations.name: Bali
destinations.description: A tropical paradise with lush jungles, beaches, and vibrant culture.

destinations.name: Cape Town
destinations.description: A coastal city with stunning mountains, beaches, and rich history.

destinations.name: Reykjavik
destinations.description: A gateway to the Northern Lights, geysers, and volcanic landscapes.

destinations.name: Petra
destinations.description: An ancient archaeological wonder carved into rose-red cliffs.

destinations.name: Bangkok
destinations.description: A vibrant city with floating markets, ornate temples, and street food.

destinations.name: Rio de Janeiro
destinations.description: Famous for its Carnival, Christ the Redeemer statue, and stunning beaches.

destinations.name: Prague
destinations.description: A fairy-tale city with medieval architecture, a historic castle, and vibrant nightlife.

destinations.name: Sydney
destinations.description: Home to the Sydney Opera House, stunning beaches, and the iconic Harbour Bridge.

destinations.name: Dubai
destinations.description: A futuristic city known for its skyscrapers, luxury shopping, and desert adventures.
